messages.title: Without The Brexit Party There Can Be No Real Brexit
messages.content: Vote for the Brexit Party in Leeds Central on December 12th. There are around 130 parliamentary seats the Conservatives have not won for at least 50 years and will not win in this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money, fishing and defence
Let's make Parliament serve the people
More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health
Freed from EU rules we can cut energy bills and make food and clothing cheaper
Spend £100bn on transport schemes and jobs in the Regions
We need a fair points-based system, blind to ethnic origin

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote for the Conservatives may risk letting in another Labour MP who wants a second referendum. Vote for the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour. Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
issues.governance: The Brexit Party backs fundamental democratic reform to fix our broken Parliament and change politics for good.
issues.health: Investing in the NHS - More doctors, less waste, no privatisation, end the postcode lottery on health.
issues.economy: Cutting the Cost of Living - Freed from EU rules we can cut energy bills and make food and clothing cheaper.
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration - We need a fair points-based system, blind to ethnic origin.

housing.content: Spend £100bn on transport schemes and jobs in the Regions

images.caption: Nigel Farage, Leader of The Brexit Party
